body:
This PR adds a dependency on the `uuid` virtual package. It also refactors the dependency linking to specify all dependencies. This isn't really needed for any dependencies other than `zlib` and `uuid`, but I don't see any reason not to loop over all dependencies.

@alalazo is there a cleaner way to do this than what I did?

Fixes #21672  @LutzWeischerFujitsu @haampie @LDAmorim 
Fixes #22335 @vsoch
title: Serf: add missing libuuid dependency
